section.heading: Delivery of election laws to clerks, boards and election officers

content.p:
ยง 4-126. Delivery of election laws to clerks, boards and election
officers. 1. The state board of elections, within ten days after the
enactment of any amendment to the election law, shall transmit a copy of
such amendment to each board of elections.
 2. The state board of elections shall, prior to each general election,
prepare, and cause to be printed in such formats as the board shall
determine, compilations of the election law. A copy of the full text of
such law shall be transmitted to each board of elections at least once
each year. Additional copies of such text, or portions thereof, shall
be made available to the public upon request.
